DOC.brief_title: Tear Dynamics After Restasis Treatment Dry Eye Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Using image device name optical coherence tomography image tear volume dry eye patient Restasis treatment .
DOC.criteria: The participant eligible entry study s/he : 1 . Is least 18 year old full legal capacity volunteer ; 2 . Has read sign IRB Informed Consent Document ; 3 . Is willing able follow participant instruction ; 4 . Has clear cornea ; 5 . Has 20/100 uncorrected visual acuity well ; 6 . Has dry eye accord study definition DES ( study subject ) ; 7 . Has use Restasis within 3 month . The subject ineligible entry study s/he : 1 . Has systemic disease affect ocular health except Sjögren 's syndrome ; 2 . Is use systemic topical medication affect ocular health except artificial tear ; 3 . Has active ocular disease DES , Sjögren 's syndrome 4 . Has clinically significant lid conjunctival abnormality , neovascularization , corneal scar corneal opacity ; 5 . Has limbal bulbar injection corneal stain clinically significant , due DES ; 6 . Has wear rigid gas permeable lens within 1 year study ; 7 . Has surgery eye injury within 6 month ; 8 . Was soft contact lens wearer within 2 week study .
